name: The backrooms game (itch) (epiclolz)
description:
INFO/DESCRIPTION

have fun in the backrooms, keep in mind, this is my first game! i'll keep in mind to add some of your ideas!

so far dying is not a thing, ill make sure to add that soon, i just don't know how just yet,  things might not go as intended and there might be bugs

also the run for your life music is by Dapper Husky, he has made great music, make sure to give him a sub!

CREDITS

epiclolz - main creator

jackORsomething - easter egg ideas and just ideas in general

TheSmiler - ideas and speedrunning my game for some reason

Dapper Husky - that awesome music, for some reason i can't link his youtube, so just search it   ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

google - textures






DOWNLOAD GUIDE

if you don't know how to download things, this is for you

click download

right click the file in file explorer click on extract all (if you have winrar click extract here)

open the file that has popped up in the file location the zip was in

open "windows"

then open "TheBackroomsGame.exe"

(I doubt anybody doesn't know how to download a game xD but still, some people don't know)
